Test Summary: Check if the user can access the sell section
Step: Go to homepage and enter your valid credentials.
Expected Result: Logs in.

Test Summary: Check if the user can access the sell section
Step: Click on the Sell Now button.
Expected Result: User is redirected to the item listing form page.

Test Summary: Check if the user can delete a listed item
Step: Go to homepage and enter your valid credentials.
Expected Result: Logs in.

Test Summary: Check if the user can delete a listed item
Step: Go to your profile page, click on the listed item, click delete item.
Expected Result: The item is deleted.

Test Summary: Check if the user can add item details
Step: Go to homepage.

Test Summary: Check if the user can add item details
Step: Click on the "Sell Now" button.
Expected Result: User is redirected to the item listing page.

Test Summary: Check if the user can add item details
Step: Click on upload images. Select all the four pictures from the folder "Pants" in the drive.
Expected Result: Images are successfully uploaded.

Test Summary: Check if the user can add item details
Step: Enter title: Black Levi's jeans Enter Description: New jeans. Never worn. Size 33 W x 32 L  Enter Category: Men>Clothing>Jeans>Straight Fit Jeans Enter Brand: Levi's Enter Size: W33 Enter Condition: New without tags Enter Colours: Black  Enter Material: Cotton Enter Price: 125 RON Select parcel size: Small
Expected Result: Information is accepted and shown in preview.

Test Summary: Check if the user can add item details
Step: Click the "Upload" button in the bottom right corner of the page.
Expected Result: Item is successfully listed and visible in the user's profile.

Test Summary: Check if the user cannot upload more than 20 photos
Step: Go to home page.

Test Summary: Check if the user cannot upload more than 20 photos
Step: Click upload photos and add all 21 photos from the folder "Pants-21" in the driver.
Expected Result: Receive an error message: You have exceeded the maximum number of allowed photos. Please remove some photos to continue.

Test Summary: Check if the user receives a confirmation message
Step: Observe what appears on the screen after listing the item.
Expected Result: A confirmation message is displayed.

Test Summary: Check if the user can save as a draft the item
Step: Click on the "Sell Now" button.

Test Summary: Check if the user can save as a draft the item
Step: Click on upload images. Select all the four pictures from the folder "Pants" in the drive.

Test Summary: Check if the user can save as a draft the item
Step: Enter title: Black Levi's jeans Enter Description: New jeans. Never worn. Size 33 W x 32 L  Enter Category: Men>Clothing>Jeans>Straight Fit Jeans Enter Brand: Levi's Enter Size: W33 Enter Condition: New without tags Enter Colours: Black  Enter Material: Cotton Enter Price: 125 RON Select parcel size: Small

Test Summary: Check if the user can save as a draft the item
Step: Save as a draft
Expected Result: The item is saved as a draft on you user profile.

Test Summary: Check if the user can finish editing the draft
Step: Click on the "Sell Now" button.

Test Summary: Check if the user can finish editing the draft
Step: Click on upload images. Select all the four pictures from the folder "Pants" in the drive.

Test Summary: Check if the user can finish editing the draft
Step: Enter title: Black Levi's jeans Enter Description: New jeans. Never worn. Size 33 W x 32 L  Enter Category: Men>Clothing>Jeans>Straight Fit Jeans Enter Brand: Levi's Enter Size: W33 Enter Condition: New without tags Enter Colours: Black  Enter Material: Cotton Enter Price: 125 RON Select parcel size: Small

Test Summary: Check if the user can finish editing the draft
Step: Save as a draft.
Expected Result: The item appears as a draft on your user page.

Test Summary: Check if the user can finish editing the draft
Step: Go to you user page, click on the finish editing button and click the upload button.
Expected Result: The item is listed on you user profile and it appears active.

Test Summary: Check if the user cannot upload an item leaving the fields blank
Step: Go to homepage and enter your valid credentials.
Expected Result: Logs in.

Test Summary: Check if the user cannot upload an item leaving the fields blank
Step: Click on sell now button.
Expected Result: The sell an item page opens.

Test Summary: Check if the user cannot upload an item leaving the fields blank
Step: Don't fill in all required fields and just click the upload button.
Expected Result: Upload fails.Under each empty required field (e.g., Upload photos, Title, Category, Description, Price), an inline error message appears in red text indicating the missing action.

Test Summary: Check if the user can promote (bump) an item
Step: Go to homepage and enter your valid credentials.
Expected Result: Logs in.

Test Summary: Check if the user can promote (bump) an item
Step: Upload and item from the device.
Expected Result: Item appears in the profile page.

Test Summary: Check if the user can promote (bump) an item
Step: Click bumb, select the first option (3-day local Bump), click review order, select payment with card, introduce card details, and click pay.
Test Data: Name: Tim Allen Test Card Number (Visa): 4040 4040 4040 4040 Expiry Date: 06/26 CVC: 123
Expected Result: Payment accepted.

Test Summary: Check if user can use another card to promote an item
Step: Go to homepage and enter your valid credentials.
Expected Result: Logs in.

Test Summary: Check if user can use another card to promote an item
Step: Go to the sell an item section. Upload and item from the device.
Expected Result: Item appears in the profile page.

Test Summary: Check if user can use another card to promote an item
Step: Click bumb, select the first option (3-day local Bump), click review order, edit payment with card, introduce new card details, and click use this card.
Test Data: Name: Tim Allen Test Card Number (Visa): 4141 4141 4141 4141 Expiry Date: 10/27 CVC: 234
Expected Result: New card added.

Test Summary: Check if you cannot increase the price of a bumped item
Step: Go to homepage and enter your valid credentials.
Expected Result: Logs in.

Test Summary: Check if you cannot increase the price of a bumped item
Step: Go to your profile section, click on the bumped item, click on edit listing, change the price from 90 RON to 91 RON, click save.
Expected Result: Cannot save the changes made. Under the price field appears an inline error message with text in red: Please enter a price under 90.0

Test Summary: Check if you can decrease the price of a bumped item
Step: Go to homepage and enter your valid credentials.
Expected Result: Logs in.

Test Summary: Check if you can decrease the price of a bumped item
Step: Go to your profile section, click on the bumped item, click on edit listing, change the price from 90 RON to 89 RON, click save.
Expected Result: The changes made are saved.

Test Summary: Check if the user can use the sell button (+) on mobile devices
Step: Log in from the mobile device using valid credentials.
Expected Result: Logs in.

Test Summary: Check if the user can use the sell button (+) on mobile devices
Step: Tap the sell button (+) to upload an item.
Expected Result: User is redirected to the item listing form page.

Test Summary: Check if the layout of the description field doesn't break on mobile devices
Step: Log in using valid credentials.
Expected Result: Logs in.

Test Summary: Check if the layout of the description field doesn't break on mobile devices
Step: Navigate to the "Sell an Item" section.
Test Data: Enter a long string of special characters such as <, >, {} or a long string of letters (e.g., aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa...) without spaces into the Description field.
Expected Result: The layout should remain intact.

Test Summary: Check if you can list another item
Step: Log in using valid credentials.
Expected Result: Logs in.

Test Summary: Check if you can list another item
Step: Upload photos, fill in the required fields, and click upload.
Expected Result: A pop-up image appears that confirms that the item is successfully listed.

Test Summary: Check if you can list another item
Step: Click list another item on the pop-up image.
Expected Result: Opens up a new listing form page.

Test Summary: Check if the user can search and filter items
Step: Enter keyword "pants" in search bar.
Expected Result: Retrieves 155 results on 2 pages. Can view pictures of different models of pants.

Test Summary: Check if the user can search and filter items
Step: Apply filters.
Test Data: Select Category > Men > Clothing > Trousers > Chinos. Size: W32. Brand:  Carhartt. Condition: New with tags and new without tags. Colour: Black. Material: Cotton.
Expected Result: Filtered items are displayed correctly. Retrieves 3 results.

Test Summary: Check if an invalid filter combination returns zero results
Step: Apply filters.
Test Data: Select Category > Women > Clothing > Skirts > Mini skirts. Size: S/36/8. Brand: Zara. Condition: New with tags and new without tags. Colour: Black. Material: Bamboo.
Expected Result: Receive a  message: No items match your search. Why not try a different keyword or change the filters?

Test Summary: Check if the user can clear filters
Step: Apply filters.
Test Data: Select Category Men > Clothing > Jumpers & Sweaters. Size: M. Brand: adidas. Condition: Very Good. Colour: Multi. Material: Polyester.
Expected Result: Filtered items are displayed correctly. Retrieve 25 results on 1  page. Can view the pictures of different models of jumpers and sweaters.

Test Summary: Check if the user can clear filters
Step: Click on clear filters.
Expected Result: All the results disappear.

Test Summary: Check if the user can click on the item image or title
Step: Apply filters.
Test Data: Select Category > Men > Clothing > Tops & t-shirts> Size: M. Brand:  Volcom. Condition: Good. Colour: Turquoise. Material: Cotton.
Expected Result: Filtered items are displayed correctly. Retrieves 1 result.

Test Summary: Check if the user can click on the item image or title
Step: Click on the item image or title.
Expected Result: Product page opens with all item details and seller's information.

Test Summary: Check if the user can view the reviews and ratings on a seller's profile
Step: Enter keyword "swimwear shorts" in search bar.
Test Data: A pair of Nike green shorts.
Expected Result: Returns 1 result.

Test Summary: Check if the user can view the reviews and ratings on a seller's profile
Step: Click on the item image or title.
Expected Result: Product page opens with all item details and seller's information.

Test Summary: Check if the user can view the reviews and ratings on a seller's profile
Step: Click on the seller's name or profile picture.
Expected Result: Seller profile page opens.

Test Summary: Check if the user can view the reviews and ratings on a seller's profile
Step: Click on reviews or star ratings.
Expected Result: The page scrolls a little bit down. Reviews, star ratings and comments are shown with correct user data.

Test Summary: Check if the user can view his last searches
Step: Click on the search for items bar.
Expected Result: A drop-down menu appears with your last searches.

Test Summary: Check if the user can save items to favourites
Step: Click on the heart icon of the first 5 items shown on the homepage.
Test Data: 2 pair of pants, 1 hoodie and 2 t-shirts.
Expected Result: The heart icon turns red.

Test Summary: Check if the user can save items to favourites
Step: Click on the heart icon near your profile picture.
Expected Result: The page of favourite items opens, you can view the gallery of items and scroll down the list.

Test Summary: Check if the user cannot save items to favourites if he's not logged in
Step: Go to Vinted platform as a guest and click on the heart of any item shown on the homepage.
Expected Result: Action is blocked and a pop-up window appears with a message prompting the user to log in or sign up.

Test Summary: Check if the user can remove saved items to favourites
Step: Go to your favourite items page, click on the red hearts of the first 4 items and click refresh.
Expected Result: The items are removed from your list.

Test Summary: Check if the user can purchase an item
Step: Go to your favourite items page and click on the first saved item.
Expected Result: The item's page opens.

Test Summary: Check if the user can purchase an item
Step: Click on "buy now" button.
Expected Result: The checkout page opens.

Test Summary: Check if the user can purchase an item
Step: Enter shipping details, select ship to home delivery option, enter your phone number and payment information.
Test Data: Name: Tim Allen, Address: Victory Avenue, no. 7, 010091, Bucharest, Romania, phone no.  +40744556677, Test Card Number (Visa): 4040 4040 4040 4040 Expiry Date: 06/26 CVC: 123
Expected Result: All fields are populated correctly.

Test Summary: Check if the user can purchase an item
Step: Click the "pay" button.
Expected Result: Transaction completes with a confirmation message displayed on the screen.

Test Summary: Check if the user can purchase an item
Check if the user can choose a pick-up point for delivery
Step: Go to your favourite items page and click on the first saved item.
Expected Result: The item's page opens.

Test Summary: Check if the user can choose a pick-up point for delivery
Step: Click on "buy now" button.
Expected Result: The checkout page opens.

Test Summary: Check if the user can choose a pick-up point for delivery
Step: Select ship to pick-up point delivery option and click on choose a pick-up point.
Expected Result: A pop-up window appears with a map of pick-up points in this area and a list of addresses.

Test Summary: Check if the user can choose a pick-up point for delivery
Step: Click on each pick-up point from the list.
Expected Result: The pick-up point moves on the map and the address location changes.

Test Summary: Check if the user can choose a pick-up point for delivery
Step: Select the first pick-up point and click confirm.
Expected Result: The pop-up window disappears and the delivery details are correctly updated on the checkout page.

Test Summary: Check if the user receives a purchase receipt of his order on email
Step: Observe post-purchase confirmation.
Expected Result: A confirmation message with your purchase receipt is sent to your email.

Test Summary: Check if the user can zoom in and zoom out on the map of pick-up points
Step: Select ship to pick-up point delivery option and click on choose a pick-up point.
Expected Result: A pop-up window appears with a map of pick-up points in this area and a list of addresses.

Test Summary: Check if the user can zoom in and zoom out on the map of pick-up points
Step: Click on the "+" and "-" icons to zoom in and zoom out on the map.
Expected Result: The image of the map becomes larger and closer or smaller and farther.
